Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; BURNED; ENGRAVED
Name: Mummiform shabti for Ankhes-en-Mut
Description: This mummiform shabti has a small head with a tripartite wig. The arms, not very well modelled, are crossed in front of the chest. The hoes have been worked in relief. The title and name of the deceased were carved on the front of the shabti and painted with light blue paint.
